5. 'It' - Based on Stephen King's novel, a chilling portrayal of childhood fears materializing as a malevolent entity. Stream it on HBO, carrying an IMDb rating of 7.3 and released in 2017.

4. 'Stranger Things' - This popular TV series blends horror with 80s nostalgia and is available on Netflix. It follows a group of friends as they encounter supernatural forces and secret government exploits. 

5. 'American Horror Story' - An anthology horror television series that airs on FX, with each season being a self-contained miniseries, following different characters and storylines related to various horror themes. Available for streaming on Hulu and Prime Video.

{'genre': 'Documentary', 'country': 'US'.response:
Based on your search criteria for genre 'Documentary' with high popularity in the US, here are the top 5 documentaries currently available on various streaming platforms:

1. 'The Social Dilemma' (2020)
Available on: Netflix
IMDb Rating: 7.6
This documentary delves into the dangerous human impact of social networking, with tech experts sounding the alarm on their own creations.

2. 'My Octopus Teacher' (2020)
Available on: Netflix
IMDb Rating: 8.1
A filmmaker forges an unusual friendship with an octopus living in a South African kelp forest, learning as the animal shares the mysteries of its world.

3. 'Icarus' (2017)
Available on: Netflix
IMDb Rating: 7.9
When Bryan Fogel sets out to uncover the truth about doping in sports, a chance meeting with a Russian scientist transforms his story from a personal experiment into a geopolitical thriller.

4. 'Crip Camp: A Disability Revolution' (2020)
Available on: Netflix
IMDb Rating: 7.7
Down the road from Woodstock, a revolution blossomed at a ramshackle summer camp for teenagers with disabilities, transforming their lives and igniting a landmark movement.

5. 'Won’t You Be My Neighbor?' (2018)
Available on: HBO Max
IMDb Rating: 8.4
An exploration of the life, lessons, and legacy of iconic children's television host, Fred Rogers.

This list includes highly regarded documentaries that have received critical acclaim and generated significant viewer interest. The provided streaming platforms and IMDb ratings will help you to find and choose documentaries that suit your preferences.

{'title': 'A', 'page': 1}.response:
Your search for the title beginning with 'A' has returned multiple results. Here are some titles available for streaming along with some basic details: 

1. 'Avatar' (2009) - Directed by James Cameron, this epic science fiction film is available for streaming on Disney+. The movie takes place in the mid-22nd century when humans are colonizing Pandora, a lush habitable moon of a gas giant in the Alpha Centauri star system. Rated 7.8 on IMDb, the movie falls under the Action, Adventure, and Fantasy genres. 

2. 'Arrival' (2016) - This thought-provoking science fiction drama, directed by Denis Villeneuve, can be found on Hulu. The film follows a linguist who is recruited by the military to communicate with alien lifeforms after twelve mysterious spacecrafts land around the world. It has a strong IMDb rating of 7.9 and fits into the Drama, Mystery, and Sci-Fi genres. 

3. 'Argo' (2012) - Available on Netflix, this historical drama is directed by and stars Ben Affleck. It recounts the story of a CIA agent who launches a dangerous operation to rescue six Americans in Tehran during the U.S. hostage crisis in Iran by posing as a Hollywood producer scouting a location for a science fiction film. The movie has an IMDb rating of 7.7 and it's categorized under Biography, Drama, and Thriller. 

4. 'Aladdin' (2019) - This live-action adaptation of the Disney animated classic is directed by Guy Ritchie and can be streamed on Disney+. It tells the story of a kind-hearted street urchin and a power-hungry Grand Vizier as they vie for a magic lamp that has the power to make their deepest wishes come true. It is part of the Adventure, Family, and Fantasy genres with an IMDb rating of 6.9. 

Please note that the availability of the titles on streaming platforms may vary based on your location and the time of search.
